lead_paragraph: MILLER--Joseph R.,of Manhattan died peacefully at home May 8th at age 93 in the company of his family. A kind and gentle soul, Joe brightened the lives of all he knew. He was a loving and devoted husband to his wife Shelley and daughter Lesley and had loving relationships with his sister Perry and countless other family members and friends. Joe graduated from the University of Michigan and had a long, successful career in advertising sales. He was an avid traveler, an advocate of the arts and gave generously to causes he was passionate about. Joe created a lifetime of wonderful memories that will live eternally in our hearts. A memorial service will be held Riverside Memorial Chapel at 180 W. 76th St. in Manhattan on Thursday, May 12th at 5pm. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MILLER, JOSEPH R.
